comments:
Eclipse 3.2M3
AJDT 1.5.0M5

And another one I get about every 5 minutes:

org.aspectj.weaver.BCException
at org.aspectj.weaver.bcel.BcelWeaver.weave(BcelWeaver.java:1086)
at org.aspectj.ajdt.internal.compiler.AjCompilerAdapter.weave(AjCompilerAdapter.java:300)

at org.aspectj.ajdt.internal.core.builder.AjBuildManager.performCompilation(AjBuildManager.java:809)
at org.aspectj.ajdt.internal.core.builder.AjBuildManager.doBuild(AjBuildManager.java:254)

BCException thrown: Can't find bcel delegate for com.ibm.correlation.rules.CloneManager$ActivateEitherProcessDeactivateKeyProcessor type=class org.aspectj.weaver.ReferenceType
when weaving classes 
when weaving 
when incrementally building BuildConfig[C:\eclipse\workspace\.metadata\.plugins\org.eclipse.ajdt.core\act-tester.generated.lst] #Files=332

Are you expecting this type:

com.ibm.correlation.rules.CloneManager$ActivateEitherProcessDeactivateKeyProcessor

to be woven in your app?  As I mentioned on the other bug - if you send me your project I can try recreating it here for further investigation - as I imagine it will be too tricky to try and narrow down a testcase to reproduce this problem.

Yes, I was expecting that type... (the first part is my original class name, the inner class is something that one of our colleagues in Raleigh added. Fascinating with what names they come up with, isn't it? :-) )

Alas, as I wrote in my other mail: most of these problems appear not (easily) reproducible. They often surface only after a while (i.e. after editing/compiling/executing over an hour or so). Usually they suddenly show up while the thing starts automatically building/recompiling in the background.

As soon as I have something that appears to be somewhat reproducible I'll wrap up a copy and send it to you.

Michael

The corresponding failing line in the lastest version of HEAD is BcelWeaver.java:1095. This is the same error as reported in bug 119882, therefore, marking this bug as a duplicate.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 119882 ***
